fields.name: Disable memory compression and swap
fields.description: You may want to disable memory compression and swap to improve performance and prolong the SSD drive lifetime. However, this may cause the system to crash if you run out of memory.
fields.author: QuickInstall.app

fields.name: Disable boot sound
fields.description: By default, macOS plays a sound when you boot up your computer.
fields.author: QuickInstall.app

fields.name: Change computer name
fields.description: Specify the computer name
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change default shell
fields.description: Specify the default shell. Supported values are "bash", "csh", "dash", "ksh", "sh", "tcsh", and "zsh".
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change software update frequency
fields.description: macOS automatically checks for software updates but you cannot change how often it checks in System Preferences.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable crash reports
fields.description: The crash reporter takes up a lot of resources and if you are a developer, you may quickly get annoyed by the constant popups.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Always keep windows
fields.description: macOS can remember all the tabs and windows you had opened for the next time you launch it again.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Put computer to sleep due to inactivity
fields.description: You can put the computer to sleep for battery saving or privacy reasons. Specify 0 to disable it.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Put computer to sleep delay in minutes

fields.name: Put display to sleep due to inactivity
fields.description: You can put the display to sleep for battery saving or privacy reasons.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Put display to sleep delay in minutes

fields.name: Disable "shake mouse pointer to locate" feature
fields.description: By default, the mouse cursor in macOS gets really big when you shake the mouse or when you move it too quickly.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Disable shake mouse pointer to locate

fields.name: Disable iTunes media keys
fields.description: If you have iTunes installed, when you press Play on the keyboard, or connect a headset or Bluetooth speaker, iTunes will automatically run.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable swipe navigation in Google Chrome
fields.description: By default, even if you have disabled the system-wide "Swipe between pages" feature, Google Chrome still allows you to swipe between pages.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Disable swipe navigation in Google Chrome

fields.name: Set theme to dark mode
fields.description: Specify "Dark" to set the theme to dark mode and "Light" to set it to light mode.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change Dock animation effect
fields.description: macOS animates the Dock when you open or close an application. Supported effects are "genie", "scale" and "suck".
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable showing recent applications in Dock
fields.description: By default, macOS shows three most recent applications in the Dock.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Disable showing recent applications in Dock

fields.name: Enable Dock icons spring loading
fields.description: Dock icons can operate with the same spring-loaded features as folders. By default, this feature is disabled.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Lock Dock icon size
fields.description: You can lock the size of the Dock icons to prevent them from being resized.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Set Dock icon size
fields.description: You can change the size of the Dock icons to an exact number in pixels.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change Dock position
fields.description: You can change the position of the Dock to the left, bottom, or right side of the screen. Supported positions are "left", "right" and "bottom".
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Empty trash automatically after 30 days
fields.description: v
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable warnings about emptying trash
fields.description: By default, macOS warns you when you empty the trash.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable .DS_Store file creation on network volumes
fields.description: By default, macOS creates .DS_Store files on network volumes to store custom attributes of the folder.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change spring-loading delay in Finder
fields.description: You can customise the spring-loaded folder delay to suit your preference. The value is in seconds.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Enable spring loading effector for directories in Finder
fields.description: By default, a spring-loaded folder pops open when you drag something onto its icon while holding down the mouse button.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Set default view style in Finder
fields.description: Finder can display files in a variety of ways and it may open up with a different view style each time. Specify "Nlsv" for list view, "icnv" for icon view, "clmv" for column view, "Flwv" for cover flow view, and "glyv" for gallery view.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable warnings when changing file extension in Finder
fields.description: By default, macOS warns you when you change a file extension.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Keep folders on top when sorting by name in Finder
fields.description: By default, Finder sorts a directory's contents by name, with both files and folders arranged alongside one another based upon an alphabetical sorting of their names.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
parameters: Keep folders on top when sorting by name in Finder

fields.name: Show Quit option in Finder
fields.description: By default, macOS hides the Quit option in Finder.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Show status bar in Finder
fields.description: By default, macOS hides the status bar in Finder.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change sidebar icon size in Finder
fields.description: Change the size of the icons in the sidebar of Finder. Specify "1" for small icons, "2" for medium icons, and "3" for large icons.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Show hidden files in Finder
fields.description: By default, macOS hides hidden files in Finder.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Show file extensions in Finder
fields.description: By default, macOS hides file extensions in Finder.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change subpixel font rendering on external monitors
fields.description: If you are running macOS on a Mac without a retina display, or with an external monitor that does not have an ultra-high resolution screen, you may have noticed that some fonts and text can appear as blurry and difficult to read. This is because macOS is rendering the text using subpixel font rendering. Specify "1" if you want less text smoothing, "2" if you want medium-level text smoothing, and "3" if you want more text smoothing.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Include a date in screenshot filenames
fields.description: By default, macOS save screenshots with the filename "Screen Shot YYYY-MM-DD at HH-MM-SS AM/PM.png".
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable screenshot shadow
fields.description: By default, macOS adds a shadow to the screenshot.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change screenshots format
fields.description: Change the format of screenshots. Default is PNG. Support formats are "jpg", "tiff", "gif", "pdf", and "png".
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Display thumbnail after screenshot
fields.description: Display a thumbnail after taking a screenshot.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change default screenshot location
fields.description: Change the default location where screenshots are saved. Default is ~/Desktop.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable auto-open Photos
fields.description: macOS automatically opens Photos every time you insert a memory card or connect a device.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable hibernation
fields.description: macOS copies the current RAM contents to a file on the disk drive and then shuts down. This is useful if you want to resume your work after a power outage. However, it can cause problems to some applications and it shortens the lifespan of your SSD drive.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable the Sudden Motion Sensor
fields.description: The Sudden Motion Sensor is a hardware feature that detects sudden movement and can be used to protect the hard drive. However, it can also cause problems when you are using a laptop on an uneven surface and it is unnecessary if your Mac ships with an SSD drive.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable spelling autocorrect
fields.description: By default, macOS automatically corrects your spelling mistakes.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable auto capitalisation
fields.description: macOS automatically capitalises the first letter of a sentence. But for developers, it is annoying to have to manually change it back.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable smart dashes
fields.description: macOS automatically converts straight dashes to smart dashes. But for developers, it is annoying to have to manually change them back.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable smart quotes
fields.description: macOS automatically converts straight quotes to smart quotes. But for developers, it is annoying to have to manually change them back.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable Game Center daemon
fields.description: By default, Game Center daemon continues to run even when you have disabled Game Center.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Turn off quarantine of unknown applications
fields.description: When you download an application from the Internet, macOS will mark it as quarantined. This is to prevent you from running malicious applications. However, it gets annoying when it won't let you open an application when you is safe.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable Gatekeeper
fields.description: Gatekeeper requires applications to be signed by an Apple developer to run. However, code signing is a paid process and not all developers sign their applications. It gets annoying when it won't let you open an application that you know is safe.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Disable disk image verification
fields.description: You can skip disk image file checksum verification to speed up the mounting of disk images through this is not recommended by Apple or security experts.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App

fields.name: Change Launchpad grid layout
fields.description: Change the number of columns and rows in the Launchpad grid layout. Default is 7x5.
fields.author: QuickInstall.App
